Michael Jordan jumper was deadly.'' Using mostly jump shots, Allen Iverson went 20-of-30 from the field. He also hit 10-of-13 free-throw attempts en route to his third career 50-point game and first since February 6 against Sacramento. When your jumper is on, the basket seems like an ocean and the basketball seems like a rock, he said.`` That is the way it felt tonight.`` My teammates are the ones that set the screens for me and got me the ball in spots where I need the ball. Around 1,000 people scaled the walls on the museum's eastern side on Friday, according to Zahi Hawass , secretary general of the Supreme Council of Antiquities. They went into the Late Period gallery, but when they found no gold, they broke thirteen vitrines and threw the antiquities on the floor, Zahi Hawass said on his blog. .'' Mike Pence 's plans should keep the Republican field clear of other strong candidates.`` The social conservatives love him,'' says former Republican state chairman Rex Early. Twitter account on Thursday, Eric Schmidt wrote:`` Day-to-day adult supervision is no longer needed.''`` I believe Larry is ready'' to take over as CEO, Eric Schmidt said during a call with analysts. It's time for him to have a shot at running this. some concern that the two new superstar judges might distract from the promised return to a focus on the contestants.`` My biggest hope is that` Idol' finds one-of-a-kind talent this season,'' Jim Cantiello said. Ellen DeGeneres proved that a big star on the judges' panel does not necessarily ensure a must-see` Idol.' The show lives and dies by the contestants it highlights. If they don't find the most compelling, the most interesting and the most talented group of singers, the show is going to be as culturally relevant as` Skating With the Celebrities.' Don't miss our`` American Idol'' live stream`` Judging the Judges: An` Idol' Without Simon Cowell ,'' featuring post-show analysis from Jim Cantiello and special guests, on MTV.com tonight at 10 p.m.

NFL Commissioner Roger Goodell presented the Pete Roselle trophy to him this morning. After accepting it, Aaron Rodgers talked about the journey that led him to the Super Bowl and a Championship win. Finally getting an opportunity and making the most of it, and this was another opportunity last night, they don't come around that often, i just wanted to make the most of it, we did as a team, a great team win, a great group of guys in the locker room, just really excited to be a part of it, said Aaron Rodgers . most of its current workers are located. In a speech Tuesday, Eric Schmidt said Google Inc. will hire more than 1,000 workers in Europe this year. All told, Google Inc. has more than 60 offices in 30 countries. At this stage, the number of opportunities just vastly exceed the number of people we have at the company, said Alan Eustace , Google Inc. 's senior vice president of engineering and research.
